TopicTitle: The BBC gets the order of the planets wrong.

Articles.Content:
I was browsing the article entitled "In pictures: Journey through the planets" using the BBC phone app, and saw the following.

![RN6ZB85.png](http://i.imgur.com/RN6ZB85.png)

They totally put Mars before Earth ... [They have corrected this for the version on the main site though.](http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/in-pictures-33535765)
Maybe it wasn't supposed to be in order?
Mars just wanted to get closer to Venus. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Mars just wanted to get closer to Venus. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Exactly!
